resources.string: The most used model for the titling of chess players is based on four main titles: CANDIDATE MASTER (CM), MASTER FYDI (MF), INTERNATIONAL MASTER (MI) AND GRANDMASTER (GM)
The most usual way to qualify for a Candidate Master is to reach 2200 points or more of Elo rating. The following are some tournaments to achieve that score.
In this position is it possible to checkmate how many movements?
